movie.title: Oppenheimer
movie.summary: The story of American scientist J. Robert Oppenheimer and his role in the development of the atomic bomb.

movie.title: Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse
movie.summary: Miles Morales catapults across the Multiverse, where he encounters a team of Spider-People charged with protecting its very existence.

movie.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead Reckoning Part One
movie.summary: Ethan Hunt and his IMF team must track down a dangerous weapon before it falls into the wrong hands.

movie.title: John Wick: Chapter 4
movie.summary: John Wick uncovers a path to defeating The High Table. But before he can earn his freedom, Wick must face off against a new enemy with powerful alliances across the globe and forces that turn old friends into foes.
